title: 60 fps cap in full screen and borderless but unlimited in windowed
body: I use a monitor with my laptop and I'm having this issue. It caps at 60 fps and there is a stutter whenever I click. Only in windowed mode will it allow for my normal fps. My drivers and everything are up to date what could be the issue?

replies.body: Sounds like your graphics card might be having a hard time rendering everything properly in full-screen mode for some reason. Let's start by going through the steps in our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) to see if we can narrow down what's affecting your FPS.
